Name: Label
Description: A label for the Lifecycle Event. May be repeated to provide different labels needed due to system or application constraints.

Name: EventType
Description: Indicates the type of event, using a typology meaningful to the documenter. Supports the use of a controlled vocabulary.

Name: Date
Description: The date or date range of the lifecycle event.

Name: AgencyOrganizationReference
Description: Reference to an organization or individual, defined in the organization scheme, responsible for the life cycle event.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the event such as what the event included, its importance, or other significant information. Structure supports the use of multiple languages.

Name: Relationship
Description: Allows linking a lifecycle event to one or more sections of metadata. If no relationship is noted the lifecycle event relates to its full parent StudyUnit, Group, or Resource Package.
